MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09.00am, due to a fault to an underground cable fault at Merchiston crescent and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:23am on Wednesday, 28 October 2020.
